paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Ser23Asn, including clinical significance, patient demographics, penetrance data, and individual records.

patients.phenotype: restrictive cardiomyopathy due to hereditary amyloidosis

individual_records.phenotype_details: end stage hereditary amyloidosis with predominant tracer retention in the myocardium
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We report on a women of Italian-German origin with the mutation TTR (Ser23Asn).

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to a single amino acid substitution in the TTR protein.

variants.additional_notes: The patient was placed on a list for heart and liver transplantation but died during the standby procedure.
key_quotes: Myocardial biopsies revealed the presence of amyloid by Congo red staining.
The only effective treatment in patients with manifest cardiac ATTR amyloidosis is combined heart and liver transplantation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text provided, allowing for comprehensive extraction of variant data.
